Articles.Content:
Ever since the new patch 1.3 whenever I try and play KSP it always crashes on the loading screen halfway through it. Everything goes fine during the first half of the loading screen and then it gets stuck at Asset Bundle definitions and then crashes with an an error message saying 'The game crashed. The crash report folder named '(DATE)' the date next to gme executable. It would be great if you'd send it to the developer of the game!

- NO MODS INSTALLED

- ALREADY TRIED REINSTALLING  

Appreciate any help
Instructions on how to find them are ^
